radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver is heterogeneous and echogenic. The contour of the liver is smooth. No mass demonstrated in the visualized portions of the liver. The main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. There is a small amount of ascites. No intrahepatic biliary dilation. The CHD measures 5 mm. Moderate biliary sludge and stones in the gallbladder without wall thickening. The head of the pancreas appears within normal limits. Limited views of bilateral kidneys show no hydronephrosis.
